db:article.db:para: The Shift-JIS text codec provides conversion to and from Shift-JIS.
Used in Qt Core if ICU is not used. Configure with -icu to avoid.
The sources can be found in qt5compat/src/core5/codecs/qsjiscodec.cpp.
